attributes.action: Have an independent inquiry into the finances of Flintshire county council.
attributes.additional_details: A inquiry would see where the money is being spent and highlight any corruption.
attributes.background: Council tax increasing way beyond inflation while services being cut.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because local government in Wales is the responsibility of the Welsh Government and Welsh Assembly.

You can petition the Welsh Assembly here:

https://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
